title: Bette Midler
summary: Bette Midler (/b…õt/;[1] born December 1, 1945) is an American singer, songwriter, actress, and comedian.[2] Throughout her career which spans over five decades, Midler has received numerous accolades, including four Golden Globe Awards, three Grammy Awards, three Primetime Emmy Awards, and two Tony Awards, in addition to nominations for two Academy Awards and a British Academy Film Award.
